terms_of_service_intro: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using our application. By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
tos_section_1_content: By creating an account or using our application, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
tos_section_2_content:
YOU EXPRESSLY UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT:

- The Application Owner and its developers are NOT liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages, including but not limited to damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses resulting from the use of this service.
- We are NOT responsible for any scams, fraudulent activities, or financial losses incurred through interactions with other users on this platform.
- Any transaction, agreement, or communication between you and another user (including students and lecturers) is solely at your own risk.
- While we may provide assistance at our discretion, we are under NO OBLIGATION to intervene in disputes, recover lost funds, or mediate conflicts between users.
- You are solely responsible for verifying the identity and legitimacy of any user you interact with.
tos_section_3_content: You agree to use this service only for lawful purposes. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree not to use the service to defraud, harass, or harm others.
tos_section_4_content: The service is provided on an 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE' basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, regarding the reliability, accuracy, or availability of the service.
tos_section_5_content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms of Service.
tos_section_6_content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease.
tos_section_7_content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any legal action or proceeding arising under these Terms will be brought exclusively in the courts located in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
tos_section_8_content: You retain ownership of any content you post to the Service. However, by posting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and display such content in connection with the Service. You represent and warrant that you own or have the necessary rights to post such content and that it does not violate any third-party rights.
tos_section_9_content: All payments made through the Service are subject to our payment processing partners' terms. Refunds are generally NOT provided for completed bookings or services, except where required by law or at our sole discretion. We reserve the right to charge fees for certain features of the Service.
tos_section_10_content: The Service is intended for users who are at least 18 years old. By using the Service, you represent and warrant that you are at least 18 years of age. If you are under 18, you may only use the Service with the involvement and consent of a parent or guardian.
tos_section_11_content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@taalomy.com.
i_agree: I have read and agree to the Terms of Service
accept_tos: I accept the Terms of Service
min_password_chars: Minimum 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and number
please_fill_all_fields: Please fill in all required fields
invalid_email_msg: Please enter a valid email address
invalid_username_msg: Username must be at least 3 characters long
invalid_username_chars: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
invalid_phone_msg: Please enter a valid phone number with at least 10 digits
invalid_password_len: Password must be at least 8 characters long
invalid_password_complexity: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
google_login_failed: Google login failed. Please try again.
student_app_only: This app is only for students. Please use the lecturer app.
enter_attendance_code: Enter the 3-digit code provided by your lecturer to mark your attendance.
detect_class_group: The system will automatically detect your class or group based on the code.
valid_code_required: Please enter a valid 3-digit attendance code
quiz_attempts_msg: Your quiz attempts will appear here after you complete them
quiz_being_graded: This quiz is being graded by your lecturer
time_expired_msg: Your time has run out. Your exam will be submitted automatically.
quiz_completed_msg: You have already completed this quiz. You can view your results in the Quiz History section.
quiz_instructions:
• You can only attempt this quiz once
• Make sure you have a stable internet connection
• You cannot go back to previous questions after answering
• Essay questions will be manually graded by your lecturer
